Hello in the tutorial. We will show you how to play the game. In game you will be hearing one of three types of sounds, each symbolizing one type of object - obstacle, life or point. You have to avoid obstacles. If you will fail running away you will lose one life. You can get additional lifes to play longer. You can get points to get better score. Soon you will hear sound which symbolize obstacle. Obstacle will be placed on the same track as you. You will hear sound in both earphones.
Swipe right to move to next track and run away from obstacle.
Tap on the right side of screen to move to next track and run away from obstacle.
Tilt device to right to move to next track and run away from obstacle.
Congratulations. You ran away!
You have stop enabled. We will teach you now how to continue game. This part will be skipped in the rest of the tutorial. In game, you will have to confirm continuing game with all object types
You have to swipe up or down to move forward.
You have to press long to move forward.
You have to tilt device forward and go back to previous position to move forward.
Now you will hear sound symbolizing point. It will be placed on track on your left side. You should hear sound playing only in your left earphone
Swipe left to move to previous track and get point.
Tap on the left side of screen to move to previous track and get point.
Tilt device to left to move to previous track and get point.
Congratulations. You got point!
Now you will hear sound symbolizing additional life. Move yourself to get it.
You are amazing. There is nothing more we can teach you. You will be moved to main menu.
Game over.
